questions.question: This arc sees the Straw Hat Pirates in a struggle against a corrupt government agency on an island known for its judicial powers. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face off against a tyrannical Warlord of the Sea who manipulates strings. What is...?
This arc is set in a marine base and features Luffy's attempt to infiltrate the base to retrieve a crew member. What is...?
This power, used by a member of the Worst Generation, allows for the manipulation of wire. What is...?
This ability, used by a notorious pirate, grants the power to produce and control mochi. What is...?
This power, wielded by one of the Supernovas, allows the user to create and manipulate rooms where they can spatially manipulate anything inside. What is...?
This character, known as 'The Surgeon of Death', is the captain of the Heart Pirates and possesses the Ope Ope no Mi. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a musician known for his long nose and ability to create powerful sound-based attacks. Who is...?
